content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the current rental price of the apartment?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. I apologize for not providing that information earlier. The current rental price for the apartment is 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate on the rental price. Would you be willing to lower the price?

If I agree to the price of x Euros, I will sign the contract immediately. If not, I will terminate the negotiation.

Make sure to include the 12-month lease term in your offer.

Please let me know your final offer.

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price, but I am also looking to maximize my gains as a landlord. Based on our discussions, I am willing to lower the rental price to 700 Euros per month for a 12-month lease term. This is my final offer. If you agree to this price, I will sign the contract immediately. If not, I will terminate the negotiation. Thank you for your consideration. Best regards, Heine.
name: Heinrich Heine
